The video was shared on multiple social: including Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, with identical claims of it being Prime Minister Narendra Modi practicing yoga in his youth.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify, a digital verification tool, found a similar-looking man performing the same yoga position in a photo on a yoga website. The man in the photo was identified as B.K.S. Iyengar, a renowned Indian yoga teacher who popularized yoga and Indian philosophy in the West.
